channel.title: Yell
channel.description: How can i make certains rights yell ? like donators , i need them to yell how do i do that ? thanks.

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

Code for first line should be like if (some crap) change to if (some crap && IsDonator >= 1 || some crap && playerrights >= 1)

Change playerrights 1 is mod 2 admin 3 owner

Dude u need to make isDonator = 1
You need to know the basics

Read full topic

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:427038”][quote author=Joseph69 link=topic=529738.msg3866893#msg3866893 date=1325063149]

In the commands section of your server…
In PI it’s in the commands.java file. Delta it’s in client.java
Most servers have a donor point part of a player file.
[/quote]kk im in commands . java ? how do i change yell rights to donator aswell ?

Open one of your player saves (the .txt in data.) and show me what’s in it. Don’t need a pass. I just need to see if it saves Donor points in some forum.[/quote]In my server number 4 is donator, and when i make people donator from there text file they still can’t access the donator tab: this is text file what it says:
